thread.title_full: BRIEF-Alent says gets China's antitrust clearance for deal

title: BRIEF-Alent says gets China's antitrust clearance for deal
text:
BRIEF-Alent says gets China's antitrust clearance for deal 
Oct 15 Alent Plc 
* Recommended offer by Macdermid Performance Acquisitions has received antitrust clearance from Ministry of Commerce of People's Republic of China 
* All of anti-trust clearances set out in paragraphs 3 to 9 of part V of scheme document have now been obtained 
* Follows clearances received from anti-trust authorities in US, South Korea, Ukraine, Brazil, Germany, Poland And Romania for the deal Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bengaluru Newsroom: +91 80 6749 1136) Trending On Reuters
